metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28739 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
There is a buffer over-read in Ruby before 2.6.10, 2.7.x before 2.7.6, 3.x before 3.0.4, and 3.1.x before 3.1.2. It occurs in String-to-Float conversion, including Kernel#Float and String#to_f.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28739` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu1.12
ruby2.5 - 2.5.1-1ubuntu1.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.5 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.1-1ubuntu1.12').
